name: 3rd Player for Cluedo
description:
This app acts as a 3rd play for the popular board game Cluedo/Clue.

Using included QR codes you can stick these onto the backs of your cluedo cards. Then deal a 3rd hand and scan these with the app so that the 3rd player knows it's hand without you having to look.

A fantastic app that allows 2 players to be able to play the full 3 player version of Cluedo.

If you have 2 devices you can even play by yourself by using each device as a separate player.
